text: Nero: Ah! Aren't those some food remnants over there!? From the way the vegetables have been left behind, it's gotta be Brad. Even though I told him not to just leave his leftovers lyin' around like that!
The City of Rain’s in a cocoon? How’re the eastern wizards doin’?
...ch...... Haha...... Don’t make that face...... I’ll be all right as long as I have you. I’m counting on you, buddy.
There’s no point in living if I’m not gunning for strong enemies or treasures. How is that any different from turning into stone?
…Really. Bet he’s got some bad memories about briars. Shouldn’t have asked.
Hey! Owen!! You better crawl outta wherever the hell you're hiding and get your ass out here!!
Those old geezers...... Always playing creepy games no matter which century it is.

Anyone would’ve run away! Owen was gone before I knew it, and naturally I was planning on making my getaway too, but......

I turned around, thinking that the weaklings from the South probably couldn’t get far, but they had already turned into stone.
What’s with that gloomy face?
Hey, just call me Brad. We don’t have that kind of relationship anymore, right?
My specialty is Magic Reinforcement. Even Mithra and Owen can’t act all arrogant to me because of that.
Look atcha. Those’re the scars of a man, y’know. You did great out there.

Bradley:....Ugh, that was troublesome. 
Akira: Thank you for saving me, Bradley. 
Bradley: Don’t mention it. Actually, thank you for becoming bait, Sage.
Are you kidding me?! This guy’s /my/ fried chicken, I’m not letting you squeeze it into that puny bird cage of yours.

Owen: We can both kind of tell that we hate each other.
But we also know that we’d take each other over Oz or Mithra.
Northern Country is full of beasts, but it feels like you can still get through to Bradley by talking to him.
Ahaha, just try and catch me!
Yikes, Owen's here... Turning back around.
Hah? What is it?
Huh? What an absent-minded guy. You sure you were born in the North? Make sure you change it by tomorrow. I’ll look it over again for you.
Well, it’s great that I get some freedom to myself for now, but it doesn’t change the fact that I’m still a prisoner. If I cause any more problems, I’ll be thrown right back into prison.

Snow: Hmph! Bradley-chan, since when did you become so rebellious? 
White: We’ll be lonely! 
Bradley: Shut up, don’t make so much noise. Mithra, don’t grab and eat ice with your hands.
......!? Ow......!? This thing came crashing down on my head!
You came to the kitchen because you were hungry, right? Even Oz’s here for snacks.

Selfless fools ain’t got no business bein’ bandits. Be greedy, and cling to that life with all you’ve got. Don’t matter who condemns you. I’ll always have your back.

Tell me ya don’t wanna die. Or, at the very least, tell me ya don’t want me to die.

I’m never going back to that prison ce......

......Ah, achoo!
Our reputation’s at risk here. C’mon, let’s try an’ look for here a bit more.
Ahaha! That’s great, Sammy. I’ll protect you ‘till I can hand you over to some officials, so you better tell them all about the great work I did, got it?

Bradley: I sneezed and got blasted far away.
Nero: ......You sneezed?
Bradley: Yeah.
Nero: Like, ah-choo?
Bradley: Yeah.
I swear, those damn twins.. Keepin’ an eye on Owen is one thing, but havin’ to handle you, too?
The twins would make a lot of noise if I started shooting in here, so I have no other choice.
Took the words right outta my mouth.

Heathcliff: Umm...... Sneezing yourself into the distance seems kind of fun.
Bradley: You bastard.

Bradley: Mithra’s magic tool used to belong to Tiletta. So that might be Tiletta right in the center. I heard she had a great appetite.
Akira: Could she really eat this much?
Bradley: Oh yeah, definitely. I can too.
The fuck is ‘chocolate’? I’m good at eatin,’ not cookin.’
Whoops, he passed out. Man, as if I didn’t already have my damn hands full…

Who knows? It was just some grandpa. I knew Mithra was just harassing him for fun, but......
There was a look in his face that said he wanted to survive. I just thought it was a good expression.
Hey! Owen!! You better crawl outta wherever the hell you're hiding and get your ass out here!!
Shut up. When I returned to my comrades completely beaten up, they gave me an earful too. Laying a hand on Mithra was banned, after all.
Nero probably made something and left it out here anyway... see, found it, found it.

Owen: He is weak. He's not weak because he's alone. He's weak because he still worries about other people, even though he's all alone.

Bradley has very human qualities— he runs himself into the ground for the people he loves, because he just can't abandon anyone close to him.
Pipe down!? What the fuck!?

Bradley: If you get it then don’t disobey me. See, this biggest fish that looks fleshy? It’s mine.
Lennox: The big fish are for the children.
Bradley: You’re so noisy. Then I’ll take this, and this. They look like they’d have roe in them.

Bradley: The guy who cooked for us said that he’d be fine with building a small hut near the entrance or even outside, but it’s so cold. Wouldn’t you feel bad?

Akira: That’s true... He’d have to spend long hours outside everyday, too. You really care about your friends.
Shut up then. I’m going to commit lovers’ suicide with my meat.
Hey, whatcha looking around for? Eyes over here. Let me tell you who you owe your life to. Me, the Great Bradley Bain.
Hey, just call me Brad. We don’t have that kind of relationship anymore, right?

Tch... I finally got my hands on some good food. Don't get in my way like that.
Why'd you drag me out here, Nero?
You think so? Well, if it can’t be anything physical, then I want freedom. From prison.
Murr: That’s Bradley’s Calamity Affliction for ya! He sneezes and poof! He’s gone who knows where!

Ahaha! Drawing your sword won’t get you anywhere! Some upstart like you can’t stop me!
I am the great Northern wizard Bradley, leader of the Bandits of Death!
Yikes, Owen's here... Turning back around.
Yo, Sage. You’re skinny, so you should eat a bony fish. Here, this one.

Mithra: Doing it this way gives it that handmade feel.
Bradley: But you’re using your fucking feet?!

Mithra: Bad memories?
Bradley: They’re kinda like a curse. Pictures in yer mind that you just can’t forget and they weigh on ya. …Huh?
Ahaha!! Then I guess we better make it back in one piece, yeah? You go an’ put that ring on my finger every time yer up for a big challenge, got it?!
What’s with that gloomy face?
…Tryin’ to get up again, ya stubborn bastard? Leave the rest to me.
Caught you, Sage! You’ve come at a good time!
Quit yer blubberin’, Rookie Shortstuff. Here, it’s that ring ya nabbed. You found yerself a real treasure.
What are you looking at? I'm gonna eat you too.

Well, the North is the strongest when it comes to the wizards and the magic of the land.
There’s no point in going to other countries. There are no strong guys or high-value mana stones there. That’s so uncool.
It’s a mana stone of the highest grade. I’m not going to hand it over to you bastards.
Akira: (Could Bradley actually have the most common sense out of all the Northern Country magicians…?)

Mithra: Mana stones.
Owen: Mana stones would be great.
Bradley: Yeah, let’s go with mana stones.
Nice. I’ll take my time savorin’ it, then. Down the hatch!

Bradley: Yeah. I just so happen to LOVE bein’ charitable right now, y’know.
Mithra: It must be hard to be a convict. Having to earn points by saving people.
Bradley: Yeah, well, they should hurry up and throw you in the slammer too. …C’mon, eat some of this sugar.

Bradley: What, do we look like some goody-two-shoes to ya? How about you?
Kuromi: Heh! I’m real bad!
Bradley: Looks like we’ll get along then. We ain’t got a good bone in our bodies.

Bradley: Mithra’s magic tool used to belong to Tiletta. So that might be Tiletta right in the center. I heard she had a great appetite.
Akira: Could she really eat this much?
Bradley: Oh yeah, definitely. I can too.
Bradley Bain. Northern wizard. I’m about 600 years old. In the North, I lived the life of a bandit along with my subordinates.

Akira: Did you think so too, Bradley?
Bradley simply smiles without answering my question.
Well, ain’t you a sensitive soul yerself. I get why Bar Bennet is such a hot spot in the Nectaris Arts District.

But the one who answered Mitile’s call was not his loving mother in heaven.

It was the northern wizard Bradley.
The Iestrum? They’re no big deal. You just saw them.
Took the words right outta my mouth.
Our enemies and allies both know that you're number two. Just call me Brad. Go on, try saying it.

.......Well, I guess that's not a bad idea... Your food was real good, after all.
I see.... That’s disappointing, but I guess that's how it is. Cook meals, watch horses, do whatever you want.
The City of Rain’s in a cocoon? How’re the eastern wizards doin’?
But there was this sexy guy who worked with us once when we were hunting big game.
It’s important to use your brain when fighting too. I used to go there before a job.
Chill, it’s just some bats. Make sure you don’t get distracted; you’ll slip and fall. It’s slippery here, after all.
Well, that’s because I used to go on a rampage. A lot of things happened, but I quite like this scar, it’s a man’s pride.
All right! Follow me, birdbrain!

Nero: But there aren’t that many people who can persist after having their hearts and bodies trampled. That’s what he doesn’t get.
.......That’s just what I suspect , though.
I had a good laugh at it too! Although the grandpa twins are monitoring me now, it feels great to be able to walk around freely.
Hey, whatcha looking around for? Eyes over here. Let me tell you who you owe your life to. Me, the Great Bradley Bain.
I’m a true Northern magician. Born and raised there.

Nero: …Brad…
Bradley: You can take this from my tab, chef.
If I took my shirt off, it’ll be amazing... want to see?

Bradley smiles with his eyes cast downwards. He kneels on the ground, and carefully picks up the mana stone.
His gaze seems to convey gratitude to his old comrade-in-arms. Sadness, compassion, respect, and an all-encompassing love are written in his eyes.

I’m never going back to that prison ce......

......Ah, achoo!

Mitile: Bradley!
Riquet: Bradley!

Relief and delight flooded the boys’ faces. Bradley flashed them a smile.
The twins would make a lot of noise if I started shooting in here, so I have no other choice.
Yikes, Owen's here... Turning back around.

Akira: Um… What kind of men does Olivia like again?
Bradley: To put it simply, guys like me.
Faust: So she likes juvenile delinquents?
Oz: So she has bad taste?
Bradley: You two wanna go?!

Then you better not fuck it up. Otherwise I’m gonna finish it off myself.

Adnopotensum!

Tch..... The twins said I could reduce my sentence by doing volunteer work.
I'm only helping you so I can get released as soon as possible.
They can’t blame us if we get a lil’ rowdy, ya know how birthdays are.
I wasn’t expecting anything from the start anyways. Well, once I get free from prison, I’ll let you become my underling, so look forward to that!

Nero: …Yeah. Brad, you ready?!
Bradley: Anytime.
Looks like I made you wait, Gorman. Sorry for being late.
I immediately made a big fuss in the cell. Saying, “How could you! Locking up the Sage’s magician! Isn’t the world important to you?!”
Shut up. When I returned to my comrades completely beaten up, they gave me an earful too. Laying a hand on Mithra was banned, after all.
But there was this sexy guy who worked with us once when we were hunting big game.
Eating supper reminds me... I used to have someone who was like a partner to me.
Hey, what’s the next question? If you’re half-asleep, I’m going to shrink your body, stuff it into a sandwich and eat it.
The City of Rain’s in a cocoon? How’re the eastern wizards doin’?
Whaddya want, little lord.
I don’t like the fact that I’m forced to be a Sage’s wizard. I don’t take orders from others, I’ll decide what I want to do for myself.

Just who the hell do ya think I am?

…Is what I’d like to say, but truth is, I’ve never gone at it against that thing. Can’t guarantee I’ll be able to take it out in one shot. But I’ll keep shootin’ till it’s down. Ain’t Central Shortstuff’s magical artifact a lantern?
Yo! If it ain’t Nero!

Mithra: You can call him Brad. It’s his nickname.
Bradley: Knock it off with the embarrassin’ intro.
Voice of a tired man: ......Hey, what does it mean for a wizard to make a promise? They were driving that bandit into making a promise......
Huh? What an absent-minded guy. You sure you were born in the North? Make sure you change it by tomorrow. I’ll look it over again for you.

Bradley murmurs quietly, and puts the mana stone into his mouth.

He doesn’t show any sign of swallowing it, but the presence of the mana stone vanishes.

It is truly a funeral rite befitting a wizard.

White: Yes. For that reason, we tie a rope around his neck, and make sure that he’s aware that we stand above him.
Most of the time he’s just a naughty, silly, young, and adorable wizard.
Sure made a damn mess that other day, huh? After I sneezed myself away, for a minute there I thought we were done for!
Here, eat some meat and forget about it!

Akira: Um… What kind of men does Olivia like again?
Bradley: To put it simply, guys like me.
Faust: So she likes juvenile delinquents?
Oz: So she has bad taste?
Bradley: You two wanna go?!
This right here’s the Good Luck Ring. The savin’ grace for us social outcasts.
Hey! Stop grumbling, you two, and put the goddamn clothes on!
Are you kidding me?! This guy’s /my/ fried chicken, I’m not letting you squeeze it into that puny bird cage of yours.
Sorry, but I ain’t eatin’ any fried chicken with a poisonous snake attached to it.

Bradley: What, do we look like some goody-two-shoes to ya? How about you?
Kuromi: Heh! I’m real bad!
Bradley: Looks like we’ll get along then. We ain’t got a good bone in our bodies.
You got it. I’ll send it on some flowery stationery. Anyway, back to the point.

Shylock: …It appears Bradley’s shotgun has transformed itself into a pistol…
Murr: Bradley specializes in strengthening magic! Never seen his top class work in person before!

Akira: Is it fine if I try touching his hair..? 
Nero: What’s so fun about touching that..?
Akira: I was curious because Bradley’s hair looks like it’d feel like a dog’s fur…
Ugh, I just want to do as I please, be it crime or treason!

Bradley: I wouldn’t make such a mistake. I haven’t shot a revolver in years, just wanted to do it for some entertainment.
Akira: Please don’t do it in your room?!
Yo, Sage. You’re skinny, so you should eat a bony fish. Here, this one.
Quit yer blubberin’, Rookie Shortstuff. Here, it’s that ring ya nabbed. You found yerself a real treasure.
Can’t you see? I’m trying to make that stupidly huge bird into fried chicken.
Shut up. When I returned to my comrades completely beaten up, they gave me an earful too. Laying a hand on Mithra was banned, after all.
Look atcha. Those’re the scars of a man, y’know. You did great out there.

Mithra: Doing it this way gives it that handmade feel.
Bradley: But you’re using your fucking feet?!
Usually, it kind of feels like a festival that lasts only one night. We gather together, break out the alcohol, drink and eat, say “Let’s do it,” and fight, and then call it a night.
But there was this sexy guy who worked with us once when we were hunting big game.

It is a rough and intimidating voice, but by turns kind and friendly.
“Don’t worry about it, Gorman. This injury is nothing; it’ll heal up in no time.”
It’s a mana stone of the highest grade. I’m not going to hand it over to you bastards.
Ya don’t look it to me… Ah, right. Remember this bad boy?

Akira: Did you think so too, Bradley?
Bradley simply smiles without answering my question.
What’s with the sudden poetry......?

Bradley: Don’t go out pickin’ on people, will ya? That guy’s imagination probably got the best of him, anyway. Ain’t no way she’s that powerful.
Mithra: But what if you’re wrong?
Bradley: …Then damn, sounds like my kinda woman.
Looks like I made you wait, Gorman. Sorry for being late.
On the days meat is served, it’s my win. But on the days it’s vegetables, it’s my loss.
Ahaha! That crest! So you were chosen too, Nero!

Akira: P-Please request something that's realistic to get…
Bradley: How about...the royal family’s treasure? A machine that can churn out infinite amounts of meat sounds pretty good too.
Akira: That doesn't sound realistic at all.

Akira: Bradley has a foul mouth, but he can be compassionate and caring towards his friends. What do you think, Nero?

Nero: Uh...... Why are you asking me?

Mithra: Out of nowhere, he’ll say, “All right, so that’s decided.”
And then, before I realize it, I’m helping out with whatever he wants to do. I always end up thinking, Huh?
In my case, no matter how hot it is, my mind has to be as cool as that underground lake for me to manipulate strong magic.
Ya seem like a stand-up gal. I like yer style.
I had a good laugh at it too! Although the grandpa twins are monitoring me now, it feels great to be able to walk around freely.
Those old geezers...... Always playing creepy games no matter which century it is.
Hmph. Well, everyone’s all gone now, though.

Bradley murmurs quietly, and puts the mana stone into his mouth.

He doesn’t show any sign of swallowing it, but the presence of the mana stone vanishes.

It is truly a funeral rite befitting a wizard.
I hope you’re ready to get plowed.
It was getting really dangerous by that point, so I left too. If Oz and the twins hadn’t been there, the world would have really ended just like that.
You bastard, don’t say something ominous like that. I don’t wanna fly off when my favourite food is right in front of me.

Nero: Well...... He seems like a guy who’s easily misunderstood.
He might look like a talkative idiot, but he thinks and watches a lot more closely than he lets on. But he also doesn’t understand other people as much as he thinks he does.

Bradley: I sneezed and got blasted far away.
Nero: ......You sneezed?
Bradley: Yeah.
Nero: Like, ah-choo?
Bradley: Yeah.
Yeah. You use magic with your heart. It makes a world of difference if you just chant words that you like.
Our enemies and allies both know that you're number two. Just call me Brad. Go on, try saying it.
Akira: (Could Bradley actually have the most common sense out of all the Northern Country magicians…?)
Well, yeah, briars have really strong roots. When I had my stronghold underground, they’d sometimes break through the solid stone ceiling and grow around.

Bradley: Alright. Can I eat this meat sauce?
Nero: Don't touch it, fucker! It still needs to simmer. Want me to turn you into meat sauce?
Bradley: You're so scary, geez......
...Hmph, fine. I’ll show ya what pipes the great Bradley’s got on ‘im.
Shit! The hell did that witch go?
You awake?
Ugh, I just want to do as I please, be it crime or treason!
That’s part of it. But I had a subordinate who the Iestrum were oddly attached to. I heard it from him.

There was talk of making the Cavern of Time itself our hideout.
It’s easy shelter from the blizzard, it’s fairly spacious, and no one ever comes here. And if you fortify it, there’s enough space to make rooms for every member of the gang, but......

Mithra: Mana stones.
Owen: Mana stones would be great.
Bradley: Yeah, let’s go with mana stones.
Oi, you two! Don’t come any closer or else!

Akira: Did you think so too, Bradley?
Bradley simply smiles without answering my question.
Save it for the bath......
Nero, hurry up and cut it before they get their hands on it!
Ahaha!! Then I guess we better make it back in one piece, yeah? You go an’ put that ring on my finger every time yer up for a big challenge, got it?!
Are you kidding me?! This guy’s /my/ fried chicken, I’m not letting you squeeze it into that puny bird cage of yours.
Huh? Don’t ask something nonsensical, you sound like the Central prince.
I hope you’re ready to get plowed.
It’s important to use your brain when fighting too. I used to go there before a job.

Bradley: I wouldn’t make such a mistake. I haven’t shot a revolver in years, just wanted to do it for some entertainment.
Akira: Please don’t do it in your room?!

All right! Let’s do this! Adnopote…

…Aah….Aah…

ACHOO!
Here, eat some meat and forget about it!

The Good Luck ring! Y’know, that ring I always put on when I was up for a big challenge? I loved it!
Nero probably made something and left it out here anyway... see, found it, found it.
Shylock: Shooting someone in the chest at close-range like that… My, one must have the most trusting of relationships to do such a thing.
See, we just so happen to have an important comrade in that thorny castle. Name’s Akira. They’re kinda like the head of our whole group.
I can’t sleep with the two of you blabbing right in front of me, can I? I’m sensitive, after all.
Well, that’s because I used to go on a rampage. A lot of things happened, but I quite like this scar, it’s a man’s pride.

Bradley: The guy who cooked for us said that he’d be fine with building a small hut near the entrance or even outside, but it’s so cold. Wouldn’t you feel bad?

Nero: ......You sneezed?
Bradley: Yeah.
Nero: Like, ah-choo?
Bradley: Yeah.

Hey, Nero. It sure has been a while.
Did you have fun going clean and washing your hands of the bandit gang while I was stuck in jail?

See, he was a survivor from a different bandit gang that I crushed. I took him into my gang because he sustained some serious wounds that had him on the brink of death, but everyone thought he was going to betray me at any second and escape.
That’s part of it. But I had a subordinate who the Iestrum were oddly attached to. I heard it from him.
I don’t want to hear it from you. .......It pisses me off just remembering it. Let’s go outside right fucking now.
What’s with that gloomy face?

......!? Ow......!? This thing came crashing down on my head!

Whoops, he passed out. Man, as if I didn’t already have my damn hands full…

Won’t you get scolded for eating it without asking? 
Bradley: It’s fine, it’s fine. See, it’s my favourite. He made it for me. 
Akira: (What positive thinking…)

Ahaha! Drawing your sword won’t get you anywhere! Some upstart like you can’t stop me!
I am the great Northern wizard Bradley, leader of the Bandits of Death!
My specialty is Magic Reinforcement. Even Mithra and Owen can’t act all arrogant to me because of that.
What’s the matter? Ya look outta sorts.
As a Northern wizard, I can’t be showin’ the world we’re useless without our head, can I? I gotta rep to protect. That’s why we’re gonna fight tooth ‘n nail to get ‘em back.
...Hmph, fine. I’ll show ya what pipes the great Bradley’s got on ‘im.
Let’s break into Oz’s room!

Akira: Is it fine if I try touching his hair..?

Just what kind of situation were you in to get THAT kind of nickname…
…Really. Bet he’s got some bad memories about briars. Shouldn’t have asked.

Bradley: Don’t go out pickin’ on people, will ya? That guy’s imagination probably got the best of him, anyway. Ain’t no way she’s that powerful.
Mithra: But what if you’re wrong?
Bradley: …Then damn, sounds like my kinda woman.

In my desperation, I look at Bradley.
I shiver at the sight of his combative grin. Up till now, I had thought of him as an older brother type, just with a quick temper.
Hey, don't be like that. Let's work together again. We’ll get outta here and stir up a real storm.
Just when I thought I could finally kick back and get away from it all... I had to get dragged back into this fucking mess.

Nero: Brad!
Bradley: Yeah.
Nero: I’m gonna end this bird! Hit me with your best shot!
Bradley: You got it. You go ‘n snuff the life outta it!

Voice of a languid man: ...... Br...... Brad......

Voice of a man with a commanding presence: Yeah. ......Ahaha! What are you getting embarrassed for!
